api_url.title: API URL
api_url.description: If you have different API URL than the default https://api.hik-connect.com you can specify it here. Leave it empty if you want to use the default.

ignored_locks.title: Ignored Locks
ignored_locks.description: If you want to ignore a specific lock(s) you can set them here by their name. It is something like "deviceAlias/lockChannel/lockIndex"
